DOC.detailed_description: Over last several year , study show low vitamin D level may increase risk development Type 2 Diabetes . The investigator administer vitamin D3 ( Cholecalciferol ) nondiabetic , insulin resistant subject vitamin D deficiency ( total vitamin D level < 20 ng/ml ) increase level vitamin D initially 30-50ng/ml high normal range 51-75 ng/ml . The investigator study effect insulin action , adipose tissue inflammation , musculoskeletal function .
